about_the_game:
Experience unprecedented speed and passion! This revolutionary motion-sensing racing game utilizes advanced artificial intelligence computer vision technology to recognize your hand gestures through a computer camera. No need for a mouse, keyboard, touchpad, or any wearable devices—simply wave your palm in the air to control the race car and enjoy the cool driving fun.

Whether in easy mode or hard mode, this game brings both fun and challenges. Swing your palms left or right to steer the race car, quickly move your palm up to release a protective shield, and move it down to deactivate the shield, helping you race unimpeded on the track.

Come join us and experience this innovative motion-sensing racing game, and become the king of the racetrack!

Experience unprecedented speed and passion! This revolutionary motion-sensing racing game utilizes advanced artificial intelligence computer vision technology to recognize your hand gestures through a computer camera. No need for a mouse, keyboard, touchpad, or any wearable devices—simply wave your palm in the air to control the race car and enjoy the cool driving fun.

Whether in easy mode or hard mode, this game brings both fun and challenges. Swing your palms left or right to steer the race car, quickly move your palm up to release a protective shield, and move it down to deactivate the shield, helping you race unimpeded on the track.

Come join us and experience this innovative motion-sensing racing game, and become the king of the racetrack!

name: 体感赛车 Motion sensing car

package_groups.title: Buy 体感赛车 Motion sensing car

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win11/10
  • Processor: i5-7440hq
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Both dedicated and integrated graphics cards are acceptable; there are no specific model requirements for the dedicated graphics card
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any computer with sound capabilities
  • Additional Notes: If the computer has a camera, it supports motion control; if there is no camera, you can play with the keyboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win11/10
  • Processor: i7-13650hx
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Both dedicated and integrated graphics cards are acceptable; there are no specific model requirements for the dedicated graphics card
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any computer with sound capabilities
  • Additional Notes: If the computer has a camera, it supports motion control; if there is no camera, you can play with the keyboard

short_description: This is a motion-sensing racing game. It can recognize your hand gestures through a computer camera. There is no need for a mouse, keyboard,or any wearable devices. Simply wave your palm in the air to control the race car and enjoy the cool driving fun.
